value:
You're going to summon more friends
here for me to play with, right?
Lots and lots, I hope!

You know what I am, right? A dragon!
Which means there's almost no one
else like me anywhere!

Hey, mind playing with me? Please?
Pretty please?

Will you take me out...out...
out?!$k$pWaaah! Please take me outside
to play!

I like it when you smile. It makes
you all smiley and stuff!

I came to say hi! Wait, I was
s'posed to say, "How do you do!"
Anyway, hi!
Am I bigger? All growed up now?

Guess what! I'm the last Dee...
Dee?!$k$pOh! Divine Dragon!

Ha ha! I'm having so much fun
here, getting to play with
everyone!$k$pEvery day, all the time!
Play, play, play, play,
play...zzz...$k$pZzzzz... Oh, what? Sorry—
getting sleepy. Is it nap time yet?
Nap time, nap time, nap...$k$pzzzzzz.
La, la, la! Oh, a butterfly!
I wanna be all growed up!
